segments.text: This is exciting ! Thank you so much !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My pleasure . Release the parking brake , and we're almost ready to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Boy oh , boy ! This is so cool . Let's rock and roll !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Relax . This car is an automatic , so you don't have to worry about a clutch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which one of these is the gas pedal ?
segments.speaker: S1
